message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. I believe it will be highly valuable to you.  Given its unique features and benefits, I'm offering it at $9,500. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to stay within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $8,000?
Hi Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $8,000 is quite a bit below my asking price.  Could you meet me halfway at $9,000?
Hello Alice, thank you for considering my budget. I would like to propose a price of $8,500 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
